kana: どうもありがとうございます

meaning: suffix that attaches to country names to mean a person from that country

kana: ありがとうございます

meaning: conjecture form of です. similar to “it will probably be” or “it might be.”

a suffix that can attach to any noun to mean a person who works at a store that sells that thing

a suffix that attaches to the name of a country to mean the language spoken there
a conjunction used to create lists of items

suffix for counting the hours of the day
suffix that indicates a bill of the given denomination
suffix for a coin of such-and-such value
suffix that attaches to a number to indicate a number of times
